intro: I'm a software developer with a passion for web development. I am currently based somewhere in the world. My main focus is building fast, accessible, and beautiful websites that users enjoy.
You can have a look at some of my work here.
about: Results-oriented professional with 7+ years of experience and proven knowledge of web development, web design, and project management. Aiming to leverage my skills to successfully fill the Senior Software Engineer role in IT Industry.
Assist in the design and implementation process for new products/projects, informing senior executives of alternatives.
Involved in module development, business communication, business requirement analysis, and DevOps operations
Involved in agile project management methodologies through Jira and CICD pipeline
Independently developed JavaScript based product customization multi-vendor ecommerce web application, multi-vendor organizations management system.
